references.reason: This paper provides the technical details of GPT-4, a large language model crucial for the SAFE-SQL framework's example generation and inference.

references.paper_title: RSL-SQL: Robust schema linking in text-to-SQL generation
references.reason: This paper focuses on schema linking, a key technique used in SAFE-SQL for improving the quality of generated examples and enhancing performance.
This paper presents C3-SQL, a zero-shot approach that achieves strong performance, providing a baseline for comparison to SAFE-SQL's unsupervised method.

references.paper_title: Text-to-SQL empowered by large language models: A benchmark evaluation
references.reason: This work offers a benchmark evaluation for Text-to-SQL, providing context for evaluating and comparing SAFE-SQL's performance against other state-of-the-art methods.

references.paper_title: DIN-SQL: Decomposed in-context learning of text-to-SQL with self-correction
references.reason: This paper introduces DIN-SQL, another in-context learning method for Text-to-SQL, which is relevant to SAFE-SQL's approach and offers a point of comparison for the methods.
